TextView.android:text:
How to play the game
 You throw 5 random dice on pressing the throw button
 Per round you have 1 compulsory role and 2 optional re rolls
 you can click on the dice you would like to keep and re roll the rest by pressing throw
 on pressing score current round will end and next round will begin
 if you press throw 3 times in 1 round,the score will be updated
 
 The winner will e the first to reach the target score or above
 In case of tie you'll have to press throw with no re rolls till one wins

You can edit the target score before the game begins
 You can change the strategy used by the computer using the hard mode switch

Have fun\!
